title: Is there a problem with the LoL servers right now?
body: I keep dcing over and over again. Right now the game is literally unplayable..

replies.body:
We're not currently having any widespread disconnection issues, but you can always check our [service page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) to be sure.

If you keep getting disconnected over and over, there might be something causing your network's connection to the game server to become unstable and drop you out. Let's check the step in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so that we can get to the bottom of this.
